original_text: It is like how yeast works. A woman took some of it and she mixed it into three large bowls of flour. Then the yeast went through all the flour so that it grew big.’
korean_text: 마치 여자가 가루 서 말 속에 갖다 넣어 전부 부풀게 한 누룩과 같으니라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: It is like how yeast works.
A woman took some of it
and she mixed it into three large bowls of flour.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 큰 그릇 세 개의 가루에 섞었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then the yeast went through all the flour
